text: Can anyone point me in the direction of documentation or how to access the advanced sitemap HubL so that we can build out custom menu structures while using the advanced menu functionality in HubSpot. Looking to do something similar to HubSpot's homepage while making it easy for the customer to update pages in the future
looks like they are using a raw jinja to use it. And the naming convention looks like BEM, so I would say this is all custom code to do it, but I've been wrong before
seriously considering using hubdb to build out a custom menu
Hi gang, if you have questions about any of the newest design tools that were released at INBOUND, here's your chance to ask:
you can post messages now if you'd like. get your questions about HubDB or multi language content answered there!
